thread.title: Is Benicio Del Toro a Jedi? Oscar winner wants a pink lightsaber in Star Wars: Episode 8 - Movies
thread.title_full: Is Benicio Del Toro a Jedi? Oscar winner wants a pink lightsaber in Star Wars: Episode 8 - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Ali Plumb
title: Is Benicio Del Toro a Jedi? Oscar winner wants a pink lightsaber in Star Wars: Episode 8 - Movies
text: It's not clear whether Benicio Del Toro will play a good guy or a bad guy in Star Wars: Episode 8, but one thing's clear: he wants a pink lightsaber. Speaking to Digital Spy during his press rounds for Sicario, the Oscar-winning actor isn't afraid of wielding a weapon that catches the eye. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4532176207001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14532176207001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4532176207001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4532176207001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14532176207001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4532176207001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Whether he's a playing a Jedi or a Sith remains to be seen - though most Siths would shy away from a pink lightsaber, right?Speaking recently about whether he'll be a villain or on the side of the light, Del Toro told Entertainment Tonight:"I don't know if he's a villain. People are saying that, but it's like they read a different script than I read.""It's nice to keep people in the dark, a little bit of mystery is good," he added. "If they want to believe it's the villain, then good." Benicio Del Toro in Sicario. Episode 8 began shooting last month on Skellig Michael, an island off the south coast of Ireland that was used as a location for The Force Awakens.Del Toro's character in Sicario, meanwhile, is set to be developed into the lead for a planned sequel, should the box office receipts for the first film be big enough. Sicario is already out in the US, but hits UK cinema screens this Thursday, October 8. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4499263661001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14499263661001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4499263661001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4499263661001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14499263661001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4499263661001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
